title: Adjusted versus Targeted Fortification in Extremely Low Birth Weight Preterm Infants: Fortin Study. A Randomized Clinical Trial.
content: Fortified human milk is the first choice for preterm infants. Although individualized fortification is recommended, the optimal method for this population remains uncertain. We conducted a comparative study assessing the growth effects of adjusted (AF) and targeted fortification (TF) in extremely low birth weight (ELBW) infants.
